dtliExcerpt: Art is as smart a commentary on friendship, identity, and the unspoken expectations that tie them together as it ever was. Sure, itâ€™s wrapped in the veneer of high-brow aesthetic debate, but all that jibber-jabber is just intellectual varnish smoothing over the cracks in three fragile men who feel abandoned by each other.
